title: Ep. 158: Ayurveda for the Real Girl
itunes:title: Ep. 158: Ayurveda for the Real Girl
itunes:subtitle: Uma Oils founder Shrankhla Holecek explains the simple ways we can all make Ayurveda a part of our lives, from dry brushing to tongue scraping. Before that, we discuss Big Body Shop news; contemplate the scent of a relationsh...
description:
Uma Oils founder Shrankhla Holecek explains the simple ways we can all make Ayurveda a part of our lives, from dry brushing to tongue scraping. Before that, we discuss Big Body Shop news; contemplate the scent of a relationship; and debate skincare fridges. 


Want more Fat Mascara?
